title: Billing profile
description_company: As a company, you'll need to share an invoice for each reward in order to receive the funds.

descriptions.CLOSED: Your profile got permanently rejected, please contact us if you believe it’s an error.
descriptions.INVALIDATED: Your identity document has expired, please share an updated version.
descriptions.NOT_STARTED: You need to verify your identity in order to receive rewards.
descriptions.STARTED: You need to verify your identity in order to receive rewards.
descriptions.UNDER_REVIEW: We’re reviewing your account, please come back later.
descriptions.VERIFIED: To edit any of those information, please reach out to us.

to_company.content: You may have to go through additional verification steps in order to verify your business.

to_individual.content: You may have to go through additional verification steps in order to verify your identity.

messages.success_to_company: You are successfully switched to company
messages.success_to_individual: You are successfully switched to individidual
